# include<iostream>
#include <stdint.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 int t;
cin>>t;
for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
{
    int64_t n;
    cin>>n;
    int64_t y;
    y=n*(n-1);
    if (y==0)
        cout<<"0/1\n";
 
 
    else
    {
 
    if(y%8==0)
    {
        y=y/8;
     cout<<y<<"/1\n";
 
    }
    else
    {
 
    if(y%4==0)
    {
        y=y/4;
    cout<<y<<"/2\n";
 
 
    }
    else
    {
        if(y%2==0)
        {
            y=y/2;
            cout<<y<<"/4\n";
 
 
        }
 
 
 
 
    }
 
    }
    }
 
}
return 0;
}
